extensionSection.description: Download the Lighthouse browser extension so your friends can find you as you explore the metaverse!
extensionSection.title: Browser extension

permanentlyDelete.explanation: If you delete your account, all of your contacts, browsing history and gate details will be erased. You will be able to create a new account in the future if you wish, but this data will not be recovered.
permanentlyDelete.label: Permanently delete account?

walletSection.description: Connect a wallet to import assets into your gate and add a sign-in method. Max: 1.
walletSection.title: Wallet

app.header: Find <italic>friends,</italic> <italic>travel,</italic> and <italic>socialize</italic> in the spatial web.

notMobileFriendly.paraph1:
Sadness! Lighthouse doesn't shine on <italic>mobile devices...</italic>just yet.
But soon! Soon!
notMobileFriendly.paraph2: Meantime, come visit us on your <italic>desktop</italic> to start exploring all your metaverse dreams.‚ú®

app.subtitle: Lighthouse is the world's leading open metaverse navigation engine.

banner.title: Share your location with your friends using the Lighthouse Chrome extension!

newAlert.subtitle: Download the Lighthouse extension to share your LIVE location so your friends can teleport directly to you!
newAlert.title: Important

cookies.explanation: Our website uses functional and first-party analytics cookies only. Analytics cookies help us improve our website by collecting and reporting information on how you use it. Learn more here. Hit the slider to disable them.

404.subtitle: Working on it! In the meantime, let's...
404.title: Sorry, we haven't lit this end of the metaverse yet.

500.subtitle: We're working on it and expect to be up and running shortly.
500.title: Uh oh! It seems like our lights went out.

error.createEvent: So sorry, we couldn't create your event. Please give it a moment and try again.
error.createPlace: So sorry, we couldn't create your place. Please give it a moment and try again.
error.delete: So sorry, we couldn't delete your {{type}}. Please give it a moment and try again.
error.deleteAccount: So sorry, the request failed for some reason. Please give it a moment and try again!
error.deleteEvent: So sorry, we couldn't delete your event. Please give it a moment and try again.
error.deleteImage: So sorry, we couldn't delete your image. Please give it a moment and try again.
error.deletePlace: So sorry, we couldn't delete your place. Please give it a moment and try again.
error.fetchingConnections: None found. Luckily, this is an error so try refreshing!
error.fetchNfts: Sorry, we couldn't load your NFTs. Please give it a moment and try again.
error.forbidden: Unfortunately, it seems you don't have the credentials to access this page.
error.generic: Sorry, something went wrong. Please give it a moment and try again.
error.interested: Sorry, something went wrong. Please give it a moment and try again.
error.invalidEndDate: The end date must be later than the start date.
error.invalidPlaceUrl: The url must point to a supported world.
error.jump: Sorry, we couldn't beam you in. Please give it a moment and try again.
error.loadResults: Sorry, we couldn't load results. Please give it a moment and try again.

lostInTheMetaverse.anonSubtitle: Are you sure you're trying to join the right user? Check your link and try again!
lostInTheMetaverse.anonTitle: Uh-oh, looks like that path disappeared.
lostInTheMetaverse.subtitle: Follow their Lighthouse account to find out when they start their next adventure!
lostInTheMetaverse.title: {{displayName}} stopped sharing their location

maintenance.subtitle: Don't squint too hard. Instead, give us a few minutes as we expect to be up and running shortly.
maintenance.title: Ahem, you've caught us in a bad time.

error.marketplace: Sorry, we can't find this item right now. Please give it a moment and try again.
error.noNft: We couldn't find the right NFT in your wallet. You can try again with another or join our waitlist!
error.noWalletSubtitle: You must add a wallet to use this feature
error.noWalletSubtitle_event: You must add a wallet to your account to create an event
error.noWalletSubtitle_nft: You must add a wallet to your account to use NFTs
error.noWalletSubtitle_place: You must add a wallet to your account to add a place
error.selectNft: Our apologies, either the file type of the NFT is unsupported or cropping isn't supported for the particular file type. Please try again without cropping and if it still fails, try another NFT.
error.signInForbidden: It seems like something went wrong. Please contact our support team!
error.unauthorized: You need to sign in to access this page.
error.updateEvent: So sorry, we couldn't update your event. Please give it a moment and try again.
error.updatePlace: So sorry, we couldn't update your place. Please give it a moment and try again.
error.updateProfile: So sorry, we couldn't update your gate. Please give it a moment and try again.
error.updateProfileLater: Sorry, something went wrong. But don't worry, you can still edit this later!
error.upload: Sorry, we couldn't upload your image. Please give it a moment and try again.
error.uploadImageAcceptType: Sorry, the only file formats supported are PNG and JPG.
error.uploadImageMaxFileSize: Sorry, try adding a file that's 2MB or smaller.
error.uploadNsfw: Sorry, we couldn't upload your image. Potential NSFW content was detected.

events.fromYourFavoriteCreators: New events from your favorite creators

yourEvents.label: Your events
yourEvents.pageDescription: Below are all the events tied to your wallet address if you've connected one, as well as the events you've added natively from Lighthouse.

helper.banner: Upload a picture or show off one of your NFTs. It's recommended to use a PNG or JPG picture of 2MB or less with a {{bannerRatio}} to get the best results.
helper.experienceCategories:
Pick the category tags that best define your experience.
<highlight>Pick a minimum of 1 tag.</highlight>
helper.experienceTags: Add additional tags that best describe your experience. This will help tailor our recommendations. Pick a maximum of {{maxTags}} tags. 20 characters max per tag. Press Enter to submit.
helper.handle: You can create a unique handle which will also reflect in your gate's URL. You can change it at any time.
helper.profileCategory: Pick the category tag that best defines you.
helper.profileTags: Add the tags that best describe yourself or your brand. This will help give your gate visibility. Pick a maximum of {{maxTags}} tags. 20 characters max per tag. Press Enter to submit.
helper.square: Upload a picture or show off one of your NFTs. It's recommended to use a PNG or JPG picture of 2MB or less.
helper.username: Your display name is how other users can identify you.
